name: The Tiny Train Driver
description:
This is my submission for the Toy Box Jam 2020!

Gather resources, build rails, drive the train, earn coins and unlock new areas!

Have fun!

Known issues:

  • The game can only save up to 89 rails blocks due to limited save game size on pico-8.
  • You can't destroy rails.
  • T or X crossings are not supported
  • To restart your game, remove your itch.io cookies.

CHANGELOG:

  • Prevent building rails next to the start point
